title: My Chance
description: **This is the final book in the Chance Series**Aubrey Ryan couldn't imagine how drastically her life would change after meeting Alex Logan. The demons surrounding her accident, her previous relationship and her emotions were all too much to bear. Now living in Paris, she did everything she could to escape all that haunted her. She wanted nothing more than to leave behind the memories and the man who broke her heart, but even in the darkness, her memories were clear as day.In the blink of an eye, Alex Logan lost the woman he loved. He has two choices; to allow the best thing to have happened to him to disappear, or to fight for it. His decision had him doing all he could to get back what he lost. Although his methods were unconventional, he was ready to stop at nothing to win Aubrey back.Aubrey needed to decide if she could give Alex another chance and look beyond her heartbreak or let the memories of her past keep her future in the dark. ***Due to adult content and language - Age: 18+***
author: Joanne Schwehm
